verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] skimming over the facts involving the investigations into Russian meddling in the 2016 election .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: skimming] [ARG1: over the facts involving the investigations into Russian meddling in the 2016 election] .
President Donald Trump is skimming over [ARG2: the facts] [V: involving] [ARG1: the investigations into Russian meddling in the 2016 election] .
